content: simple plarn curtain chart free pattern materials - plastic bag yarn strips cut to 1 5 cm width or 0 5 inch - size 2mm crochet hook all stitches are double_crochet start with row 1 54 squares and continue working the chart to the row 19 then repeat row4-row19 until you get the desired length of the curtain then crochet row2 and then row1
